adverbs.description: oilily (comparative more oilily, superlative most oilily)

entries.meaning: In an oily way; with the appearance or consistency of oil. [from 19th c.]
examples: […]  the nicest young man that ever was, — daintily gloved, patently booted, oilily curled, snowily wristbanded, with a lovely cambric (prima facie) handkerchief bound about his hyacinthine locks and polished hat.
